definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

sentences.english: We left our footprints on the snow-covered ground.
sentences.chinese: 雪地上留下了一串串的脚印儿。

sentences.english: It is those lines of foot-prints that are weaved into fairy tales of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 那一行行的脚印编织了我儿时春天的童话。

sentences.english: Those are my footprints when I was 14 days.
sentences.chinese: 这是我两周的时候印的小脚印。

sentences.english: While (he was)walking along the sands . Crusoe saw some footprints in the sand.
sentences.chinese: 克鲁索沿沙滩走着的时候，看到沙子上有些脚印。

sentences.english: The forest depths, by foot unpressed.
sentences.chinese: 林深处，未经世人脚印压迫。

sentences.english: The bigger the "C" in the footprint, the higher your arch.
sentences.chinese: 脚印上的“C”越大，足弓就越高。

sentences.english: They stopped on the logging road where they met Jesse's, then veered toward the homestead.
sentences.chinese: 它们在伐木路上碰到杰希的脚印后转向了宅基地。

sentences.english: The dark halo around the LM is from the astronauts' heavyfoot traffic.
sentences.chinese: 登月舱四周的黑色光环是宇航员负留下的深深脚印。

sentences.english: In some spots, decades-old astronaut footprints are still visible.
sentences.chinese: 在一些地点，依然可见几十年前老宇航员的脚印。

sentences.english: Efface the foot prints in the sands.

sentences.chinese: 沙暴掩埋掉了他的脚印。

sentences.english: Mother raised the roof when she saw the dog's muddy foot prints on her new bedspread.
sentences.chinese: 看见新床单上有狗的泥脚印时，妈妈大发雷霆。

sentences.english: Look what you get, all for a sand fox.
sentences.chinese: 他是循着老沙狐的脚印一步一步找来的。

sentences.english: They pull on the river left a string of footprints, it was wayfarers ellipsis of life.
sentences.chinese: 纤夫在河边留下一串脚印，那是跋涉者生活的省略号。

sentences.english: Details is the process to achieve it which you have to consider carfully.
sentences.chinese: 细节是你达到目标所要做的一步一脚印的东西。

sentences.english: The rain then falling wiped away all the footprints.
sentences.chinese: 那时下着雨，把所有的脚印都冲掉了。
